Description: White faded steatite scarab inscribed with the name of Yakubher.
Curator's comments: Published in: Pharaonen Und Fremde Catalogue (Vienna 1994): No.106 Regulski, I. (ed.), 2022. Hieroglyphs: unlocking ancient Egypt, pp. 150-1
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 1994 7 Sep-26 Oct, Austria, Vienna, Museen der Stadt Wien, Pharanen und Fremde 2022-2023 13 Oct-19 Feb, London, BM, Hieroglyphs: unlocking ancient Egypt
